name: Miss Dior
details: With more than 20% oil concentration, you are likely to still notice your fragrance working from morning to evening.

name: Chanel
details: The next highest fragrance concentration would be eau de parfum (EDP)with oil concentration between 15 to 20%.

name: Flower Boms
details: Eau de cologne (EDC) has a much lower fragrance concentration (about 2% to 4%), and therefore is cheaper than those above.

name: Versace
details: With more than 10% oil concentration, you are likely to still notice your fragrance working from morning to evening.

name: The Proposal
details: While eau fraiche has a low fragrance concentration, it does not contain a high amount of alcohol.Suitable for dry skin.

name: Victoria's Secret
details: Eau fraiche is quite similar to EDC in that the scent will last for up to two hours.Suitable for all skin types.See more details.

name: Royal Lady
details: With more than 10% oil concentration, you are likely to still notice your fragrance working from morning to evening.

name: Daisy
details: While eau fraiche has a low fragrance concentration, it does not contain a high amount of alcohol.Suitable for dry skin.

name: Clive Christian
details: Eau fraiche is quite similar to EDC in that the scent will last for up to two hours.Suitable for all skin types.See more details.
